WorkItem.Description:
After loading my toon, and selecting 
Boss Handler - Where Content is Tier 12 10N, Firelands, Shannox
I get this error:
Â 
!!!! ALERT !!!!
The Damage Per Hit on your current Default Melee Attack is too low. You need to Edit the Attack or select a more appropriate boss. If this is occurring on one of the presets, please use the Submit an Issue button at the top-right of Rawr. After fixing this issue, the regular summary data will appear.

Comments.Message: Yeah, I need to change that warning.  It's not appropriate for some of these bosses.  Some of these bosses have a very low normal melee attack, but very high other effects/attacks.
Thanks, after posting I did notice that it happened on quite a number of the 12t 10n bosses.  I will just set it to "average t12 10n" for now.

I'm running into the same message on one of my characters, but with the following parameters at the top of the Boss Handler Tab:
Where Content is Tier 11 10N
The Average Boss

Am I doing something wrong? I'm very much the newbie to Rawr. Thanks for your reply.
